aboutMe.title: Nasirpur Farms
aboutMe.description: We have the best quality and lowest priced tissue culture plants and seeds in Punjab, Haryana and Himachal Pradesh. Our budget-friendly Drip Irrigation lines and tape solutions maximise agricultural produce and minimise impact on environment.
intro: I am Paramjit Singh Bal, an Agriculturist.
I have 25 years of experience in Plant Tissue Culture and Drip Irrigation Systems solutions.
I had the honour of installing such a solution for the Chief Minister of Punjab, Capt. Amarinder Singh.

ms.title: Mission Statement
ms.statement: We are committed to helping produce nutrient rich foods and minimizing the impact of agriculture on the environment. As a result, our products have both short-term and long-term benefits for you. Here you will find the best quality and lowest priced tissue culture seeds and plants. All of our services are available in the states of Punjab, Haryana and Himachal.

title: Quality
Fertigation
dripIrrigation.description: Our budget-friendly Drip Irrigation lines and tape solutions maximise agricultural produce and minimise impact on environment. You also save on resources. Our team is highly experienced and can handle diverse environments and needs.

points.title: Maximize Yield
bullets: Perfectly Balanced Ratio of air, water and nutrients in the root zone.

points.title: Huge Savings
bullets: Minimise use of herbicides and pesticides.

points.title: Custom Tailored
bullets: Tailored separately to both companies and individuals.
Smooth execution for challenging terrain such as hills.
Geared for both open fields and protected cultivations.

dripIrrigation.ps: Agronomic support and Excellent post-sales service. All services are offered in Punjab, Haryana and Himachal Pradesh.

title: Cutting
Edge
tissueCulture.description: We have the best quality and lowest priced tissue culture plants and seeds for Banana, Potato, Strawberry, Sugarcane, Kiwi, Gerbera, Pipal, Kalanchoe, Succulents and Paulownia in Punjab, Haryana and Himachal Pradesh.

points.title: Disease Free Cultivars
points.-: Plants where part of the plant is a seed, gather pathogens from the environment. This increases every generation.

points.title: Rapid Cultivar Multiplication
points.-: Usually plant cultivar is multiplied over the time period of several crop seasons for distribution.
points.+: Our method can mass produce cultivars from a single bud around the whole year!

points.title: Resilient Pure Lines
points.-: Back crossing of the same parent results in weak offspring.
points.+: We can multiply the cells of a chosen cultivar to maintain strong offspring.
